title: Bug 2120: MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: When the user opens multiple files in the application and then closes and restarts the application, the recently used file list in the File menu does not contain the previously opened files.
EB: The recently used file list should be persisted between sessions, so that the previously opened files are displayed in the File menu upon restarting the application.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Start the workbench.
2. Open 2 or 3 files.
3. Close the workbench.
4. Restart the workbench.
5. Check the File menu to see if the previously opened files are listed in the MRU (Most Recently Used) file list.
